text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been some time since Sakura<n>Chiyono O chose me as
her trainer. On<n>a day off...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer! Hello.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Yep! If I want to compete in the<n>Derby, I have to work my
body harder<n>than ever!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Maruzen, she's... always been myrole model, and now she's entrustedher dream to me. I have to makeit come true!
choice_data_list: I'll do whatever I can to help!
I'll do whatever I can to help!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm going to go run some more!<n>"Three years make a
peach, eight a<n>persimmon, and infinite belief a Derby<n>
winner!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The meaning of her saying is lost on<n>me, but I do get a
strong sense of<n>conviction coming from her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I need to do more to support herdreams. Or rather, I want to domore. That desire has never been stronger.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After finishing up some work, I stop<n>by the riverbank again.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Steady, steady... Fight!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Keep going, keep going!

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast A
text_block_list.text: Hahhh!

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: An underarm throw, beautifully<n>executed! Well done!

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text: Aww! I thought I had a chance when<n>she stumbled!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Well, you have to watch out for feints.<n>If your opponent
comes low, be sure<n>to watch your legs!

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text: That makes sense... Thanks, Chiyo!
choice_data_list: You sure know a lot about sumo.
You sure know a lot about sumo.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wait, Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
My dad's a sumo wrestler, you see.<n>So ever since I was
little I've been<n>going to watch his matches, and...
choice_data_list: You wanted to try it yourself?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: No, no, I'm perfectly fine just<n>watching!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
But those two... and the others in the<n>neighborhood
Umamusume Sumo<n>Association, they're serious about<n>
sumo.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: A sumo advisor? Me?

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast A
text_block_list.text: Even if it's only once! We really want<n>to get stronger!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Get... stronger...

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text: I lost again... Being short is justan automatic loss, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
That's not true! Being small means<n>you can be more
nimble. Let's see, I<n>think my dad taught me a few moves<n>
you could use...

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast A
text_block_list.text: Chiyo! I won my practice match! My<n>very first win!

text_block_list.name: Sumo Enthusiast B
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much! It's all because<n>of your lessons!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Your hard work is what made the<n>difference!
Congratulations on the<n>win!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
At first, I only planned on doing it<n>once. But the more time I
spent with<n>them, the more I wanted to help.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
They were just so devoted... it gave<n>me courage, made me
want to do<n>better in my races.
choice_data_list: I get the same feeling watching you.
I get the same feeling watching you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Huh? Watching me?
choice_data_list:
Your hard work and dedication give me
courage.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
N-no, no, I... I don't deserve that! I'm<n>really not doing
anything out of the<n>ordinary!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
It's just that being ordinary means I<n>have to do a lot more
than everyone<n>else and, yeah...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
But... if me doing that gives you<n>strength, then I'll work even
harder!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
For the dream I share with Maruzen...<n>and starting from
today, for you too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing Chiyono O reaffirm her<n>ambitions, I feel invigorated
yet again.
